name: (v6) Invincible Cheat 无敌作弊
author: 滞人
description:
This is a cheat mod, abuse will reduce your game experience, be careful for using this.
GitHub: https://github.com/abomb4/super-cheat
email:  abomb4@163.com
Wellcome to feedback!

Features:
- Adjustable Overdrive Projector (speedup, or slow down)
- Invincible Core and Invincible build plane
- Cheat Items (power source, liquid source, item source with 36x faster)
- Invincible Wall, Force Projector
- Several strange projectors
- Chronosphere Unloader and Pusher

这是个作弊 mod，会降低游戏体验，请谨慎使用。
主要特性：
- 可调整的超速投影（更快，也可以更慢）
- 无敌核心，无敌建造机
- 作弊物品（电源、水源、物品源超快版）
- 无敌围墙，无敌力场
- 一大堆神奇力场
- 时空提取器、时空推送器

name: Exotic Mod
author:
K103908 
(Hjsoner, Mapper, Leader) 
BlueWolf
(Mapper, Spriter, Hjsoner)
Andromeda 
(Mapper)
Meep of Faith
(Spriter, Hjsoner, Lost in scripting hell)
description:
We got together over the Mindustry Discord to bring you this exotic mod. Adds in a few things we thought would be fun.
Update log:
  V6 update! Exotic will be going through massive changes as we fix up some things!
  Core: Nexus added!
  Hellfire is under rework, and currently has a placeholder sprite. 
  Core: Requiem. Have fun.
  Pew pew, the turrets do things now!
  We really don't suggest using the Mod Factory or touching the Hellfire unit. 
  youre welcome for the v2.4 hotfix.
